# DECORATOR::DECOR_IS_REGISTERED_AS_TYPE

## Summary
Query to see if a registered decorator is of an expected type

## Parameters
* **STRING** decoratorName: Name of the decorator
* **DECORATOR_TYPES** type: Expected type

## Returns
* **BOOL**: BOOL true if decorator is registered as the time listed else false

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
type: see DECOR_REGISTER
